reviews.text: Hidden gem in a gas station.  This is authentic! Friendly service and reasonable prices! I'm excited to try more here!
Tucked away in a Sunoco gas station is this incredible gem. The burritos are stuffed and the prices are low. Everything on the menu slaps.
Grandview Diner is quite an interesting concept. It's basically a gas station and convenience store, so it doesn't sound like much. What makes it unique is...
